malachite_gem.name: a polished malachite stone
malachite_gem.description: A rich, opaque green gemstone with distinctive concentric banding. It feels cool and smooth.

azurite_gem.name: a deep blue azurite crystal
azurite_gem.description: A stunningly deep electric blue crystal. It seems to absorb the light around it.

chrysocolla_gem.name: a cyan chrysocolla stone
chrysocolla_gem.description: A vibrant blue-green stone with a porcelain-like luster. It is quite hard.

turquoise_gem.name: a rough turquoise nugget
turquoise_gem.description: A nugget of sky-blue stone veined with spiderwebs of dark matrix.
